title: Baldurs Gate 3 Wiki
content:
ter will have no recollection of the past besides walking down a path paved with blood. As you venture on, your character will find themselves inescapably drawn towards unimaginable cruelties. Can you resist these urges? You sure can, but you may miss the special dialogue and cutscenes associated with the Origin. As a character with The Dark Urge, players can freely customize their character's Race, Background, and Class.

Playable Races in Baldur's Gate 3

Anyone familiar with Dungeons & Dragon
